commit message:
Added library project nineoldandroids.

(Port of the Android Animation API of Android 3.0 for older Android versions)
Added 'swipe-to-dismiss' to the listview with the FSets in FExDetailFragment.

Bugfix DialogFragmentAddEntry: changing a FSet does now work correctly.

Before there was a problem, when there were two(or more) equal FSets in a TrainingEntry.
If you edited one of them always the first FSet was updated.
Added 2 missing translations.
Trying to fix pom.xml

Deploying new Beta build (versionCode 13).
Removed button for deleting FSet.

DataProvider: Added method saveWorkoutAsync(Workout w).

This improves the performance as storing data is no longer executed on the UI-Thread.

Implemented a Workout Cache.

Loading/parsing Workouts will now be done in the background. This improves the performance.
Started to design the activity for creating new exercises.
Its now possible to move the app to the sd card.
Added new test method: testSaveAndLoadExerciseType().
fix maven build for NineOldAndroids
.travis.yml: upgrade android-sdk

Merge pull request #15 from Mic92/master

fix maven build

.travis.yml add platform-tools

starting with android-sdk 22, platform-tools is distributed separated
.travis: downgrade to older sdk again

Merge pull request #16 from Mic92/master

downgrade to android-sdk-21

Fixed the Exercise XMLSaver.

Also added exercise caching to the DataProvider.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:chaosbastler/opentraining

DataProvider: bugfix(custom exercise folder was not created if it did not exist).

Now test should be green again.
Exercise XMLSaver: the tags will now be saved(were missing before).
Multithreading problems are ugly.

Fixed formatting, removed unused imports.

Also improved compareTo() of ExerciseType.
Externalized strings and added translations for CreateExerciseActivity.
CreateExerciseActivity: bugfixing, UI-changes, usability improvements.

CreateExerciseActivity: Implemented saving images.

Images are copied to a special folder and with names like 'img_0', 'img_1', ...
XMLSaver: Fixed saving image paths.
CreatedExerciseActivity: Added TextWatcher for exercise name edittexts.
Moved CreateExerciseActivity to own package, added it to menu.
Preparing Alpha Version (for v0.5, versionCode 14)
Refactoring: Moved Fragment classes to own files.
CreateExerciseActivity: Added fragment for the images.
Saving some minor changes before trying to remove ActionBarSherlock.

Switched from ActionBarSherlock to official Android Support Library.
Tests have not been migrated yet.
Trying to fix pom.xml
Another try to fix pom.xml
Bugfix ExerciseTypeListActivity: SearchView works again.
Added missing translation.
Added icon_barbell_black. This will be the new logo.

Removed background_white.
This background is not necessary for Holo-Theme.

Replaced white background of exercise icons.
New icon background is a white one with a black border.

Fixed files in res/menu.
Had to replace 'android:showAsAction' with 'yourapp:showAsAction'.
drop maven and ant in favor of gradle
.travis.yml: fix script path

Removed Activity for HTML export.

Might use wger export in future instead.
Added menu item for showing the description of the exercise.
Beautifying UI. Removed a (now) unnecessary background image.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:chaosbastler/opentraining
Added menu item description to FExDetailFragment, too.

Added permissions 'ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE', 'android.permission.INTERNET', 'WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE'.
Also added sync settings to SettingsActivity (the sync settings are only dummy settings at the moment, syncing has not implemented yet.).

Added a REST-client. Renamed some files. Added a dialog with information about syncing with wger.

I'm able to get the JSON-exercise file from the server. Code for parsing this file is still missing.
Had to use a workaround for SSL problems, see comment in class RestClient for more information.
Removed activity from manifest file (activity doesn't exist anymore).
Fixing build for Travis CI.
Updated install building instruction in readme.
Implemented parsing languages from wger. Started implementation of parsing exercises. Parsing muscles is still missing.

Implemented parsing muscles from wger.

Also added the muscle names of wger to the list of alternative muscle names.
Added syncing progress dialog. Also added error messages (if syncing fails or there's no internet connection).

Added more information/explanations to the sync preference screen. The sync-finished dialog will now show how many exercises have been synced.
Moved some sync settings to an own preference screen.
Implemented saving downloaded(synced) exercises. Added delete-synced-exercises button.

Added Test for WgerJSONParser.
The tests parses some example JSON files and checks the resutl.

Added changelog dialog. Will be shown on first start after update.

Can also be started in settings. Used Inscription (https://github.com/MartinvanZ/Inscription) for the changelog.

Added changelog dialog. Will be shown on first start after update.

Can also be started in settings. Used Inscription (https://github.com/MartinvanZ/Inscription) for the changelog.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:chaosbastler/opentraining

Bugfixes for WorkoutXMLParser and FExListAdapter.

Bug in FExListAdapter:
If an exercise has no images the app crashed when a new training was started.

Bug in WorkoutXMLParser:
If an exercise had been deleted but was used in a workout the Workout could not be parsed/used anymore.
Moved classes to a different package.

Bugfix: added notification if there's no description of an exercise (in FExDetailFragment and ExerciseDetailFragment).

Before there was either a not-localized message 'No description available' or an alert dialog with no text.

Some minor bugfixes.

Removed some useless lines of codes and some imports.

Added SyncFinishedDialog. User can now choose which exercises to save(with or without images/description, which languages).

Also removed two preferences that are no longer necesssary.

Fixed Tests. Improved Layout of SyncFinishedDialog.

Added a ScrollView to SyncFinishedDialog and translated two strings.

Added 33 new exercises.

Converted the orignal .png files to svg files. Also added some muscles and equipment to 'muscle.json' and 'equipment.json'.

SyncFinishedDialog will now show the full language string (not 'en' but'English').

Also removed the menu item for creating new exercises. This feature will be added in the next but one release.

Fixed NullPointerException in ExerciseTypeListFragment.

The OnPreferenceChangeListener has not been unregistered when activity stopped what could cause a NullPointerException.
Fixed some style issues for Android 2.x. Reduced logging.
Preparing release v0.5
